Container.Name: agregarr
Container.Overview: Agregarr is an automated Plex collection management tool that regularly updates your Plex collections with content from multiple sources. It integrates with your existing media management tools to provide seamless collection automation
Container.DonateText: If you like my work please consider Donating.

Config.Name: Application Configuration Path
Config.Description: The default application configuration path. (/app/config in container)

Config.Name: Movie Library Path
Config.Description: The default Movie Library Path. (/data/movies in container)

Config.Name: TV Library Path
Config.Description: The default TV Library Path. (/data/tv in container)

Config.Name: Anime Library Path
Config.Description: The default anime Library Path. (/data/anime in container)

Maintainer.Profile: Porting various Docker containers as UNRAID community apps when I can. Been a fan of UNRAID for years, just giving back in my own way.
